title: GogoSoft
name: Formation-Office
description: Blog de tutoriels Word et autres outils bureautiques

scripts.verify:assets: node scripts/check-assets-modified.js || echo "Warning: Assets check skipped"
scripts.build: npm run verify:assets && npm run prebuild && concurrently -n "ASSETS,PUG,SCSS" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run build:assets" "npm run build:pug" "npm run build:scss" && node scripts/build.js
